entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
